reviewText: My kindergarten and first grade students love to watch and draw with Pappy!

Just what we wanted. There is actually 3 episodes on this one DVD. Very cute and very good for teaching life lessons. My son used to love this show when he was on and he still loves these shows. Music is cute, the message is good and they are not over stimulating.  Wonderful!!!!!
Delivered quickly and DVD as described! Thank you!
Pappyland is always a hit and this video is no exception. This is a great way to get children who are interested in art to feel confident that "they can do it"!
